channel.title: Rsc server coding help plus need help with geminus(will rep++)
channel.description:
I GOT A FEW QUESTIONS.
1)Ok i am using the source geminus. It's a very good source but the bad thing is you gotta make char file's manually? Cuz if you don't, and you log in with an account that has not been made yet it says, "Must be a member to log in this world." Please sum1 tel me how to make it so a player can log in without me making an account for them manually.
2)ALSO, HOW DO I ADD COMMANDS
3)also, where i add npc's?
4)ALSO, WHERE do i edit starting items?
5)also, where do i edit the starting place besides edgeville
6)and starting items in inventory.
THANKS WILL REP++ IF QUESTIONS ANSWERED.

item.title: Rsc server coding help plus need help with geminus(will rep++)
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

  1. code a register script something accessed by http like php or asp script or just make players login ? and when they logout it will generate a character file?

  2. try to look around the packethandler folder

  3. look around xml files in conf folder open em in notepad

  4. find out where client calls a initialize method add your items in there

  5. look at tile class in model folder

  6. look at 4) same thing

Read full topic
